amendment.description: At the end of the bill, insert after the last section (preceding the short title) the following section: \ SEC. __.None of the funds made available in this Act for the National Institute of Mental Health may be used to fund grant number MH054142 & MH064527.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds in the bill by NIMH to fund grant numbers MH054142 and MH064527.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Neugebauer amendment (A028) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A028) offered by Mr. Neugebauer.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Neugebauer amendment (A028) Agreed to by voice vote.
